Projects

GE Site Builder

Web application used to generate the country sites for general electric.

I was part of the SiteBuilder consultant team from 2011 to 2012 we were in chage to make maintenence and improvements.

Technologies used: HTML CSS JavaScript jQuery

This tool was part of the SiteBuilder Suite. It was an online WYSIWYG website authoring tool with drag n' drop capabilities

GE Colab

This was one of the key projects for GE Digital Media Technologies team at the time an very visible for all GE's employees and managment. This social network site

.

Technologies used: HTML CSS JavaScript jQuery Backbone.js Node.js Mongoose Express.js MongoDB Grunt

BTS BUMP

This social network application was developed in the hope to raise VC money to sell it as a B2B application to enable better comunication between geographically distributed teams.

Technologies used: HTML CSS JavaScript AngularJS jQuery Backbone.js Node.js Mongoose Express.js MongoDB Bootstrap SASS Gulp

Rainbow.js

RainbowJS offers a solution to perform color operations as converting from different formats (eg. rgb to hsv), create color palettes based on color theory harmmonies. Is highly configurable and works both in the browser and node.

Technologies used: JavaScript EcmaScript 2015

Twitter Bot

This twitter bot scrap the google trends page for keywords that are trengind search terms at the moment and then searches google and twit the first search result, also checks youtube trending videos and share them.

Technologies used: JavaScript twitter api Node.js

Personal site

This is my personal website which I released as an OpenSource project on github. I had this idea of a personal webiste and blog for quite some time and finally was able to materialize this, the site is not fully finished but will remain as a work in progress for a year or two since I only work on this on some weekends and is where I experiment with new frameworks and libraries.

Technologies used: HTML5 CSS3 EcmaScript2015 AngularJS PureCSS Node.js LoopBack MongoDB
